ygData.subject: Battle at the Alliance Base
ygData.msgSnippet: Orchid, you got it all mixed up. Zardus is firing at Kambodia, not Zergling. You said that you fired on Zergling in one of your posts, but Zergling is not at

Subject: Battle at the Alliance Base
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 111
From: Yanshosh@...

Orchid, you got it all mixed up. Zardus is firing at Kambodia, not Zergling. 
You said that you fired on Zergling in one of your posts, but Zergling is not 
at the battlefield. Zardus is.

::Zardus/Hiss/Scavanger/DevilDuer::

Zardus ducks easily under the rockets, looking Kamodia over. She wouldn't be 
a challenge, he funally decides, jumping up into the air and firing at her. 
From the corner of his eyes he sees Soundwave arrive. Zardus flies over to 
him, firing another shot at Kamodia.

"We are a bit busy right now," he says, firing yet another shot, "Your help 
would be greatly apreciated..."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hiss turns quickly, Arcangel's blade slasing inches away from his chest. 
Reaching out to quickly grab the Maximal's arm, Hiss brings his knee up, 
attempting to break the arm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavanger ducks under the missiles, flying back up in a spiral, trying to 
make himself hard to hit as he fires again from his rifle at Icedragon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer's eyes widen as he sees the shots coming at him. He jumps to the 
right, the shots riddling his left leg. The Alliance member growls as he hits 
the ground, rolling to his feet to fire a shot at Shocker from his pistol.
